CustomField.description: Checking this checkbox will set up an External Project Team so that the Project Owner can add Team Members (Role = "Project Contributor") to the Project for MA Portal users to be able to collaborate on the Project. This is automatically checked by automation if a Project Manager (external user) creates a new Project.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this checkbox will set up an External Project Team so that the Project Owner can add Team Members (Role = "Project Contributor") to the Project for MA Portal users to be able to collaborate on the Project. This is automatically checked by automation if a Project Manager (external user) creates a new Project.
CustomField.label: Enable for External Project Team?
